unittitle_ssm: Brooklyn Brush Manufacturing Company articles of incorporation
abstract_ssm: The articles of incorporation for the Brooklyn Brush Manufacturing Company, founded by Freeman Murrow and incorporated in 1848. The document features a list of subscribers as well as a diagram of Freeman Murrow's patented double adjustable paint brush.
